channel.title: Oceanboom Podcasts
channel.description: Through our extensive interviews and music presentation, we aim to bring you the best of the underground music scene in Japan. Although, we intend to primarily cover Japanese artists of all genres, we will also cover foreign artists playing in Japan when the opportunity presents itself. From J-Rock, to Hip-Hop and everything else, we will bring you the best of Japanese Music.

image.title: Oceanboom.com Podcasts
image.description:
Through our extensive interviews and music presentation, we aim to bring you the best of the underground music scene in Japan. Although, we intend to primarily cover Japanese artists of all genres, we will also cover foreign artists playing in Japan when the opportunity presents itself.
All of our Podcasts are enhanced so if you listen with a video iPod or with iTunes, you will see the podcast logo as well as images of the artists and their concerts. Additionally, the Podcast are broken up into chapters for easy skipping between interviews and songs.

channel.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Oceanboom.com Podcasts. Riding the Ultrasonic Waves of Japan 日本の超•音波に乗ってる
channel.itunes:summary:
Through our extensive interviews and music presentation, we aim to bring you the best of the underground music scene in Japan. Although, we intend to primarily cover Japanese artists of all genres, we will also cover foreign artists playing in Japan when the opportunity presents itself.
All of our Podcasts are enhanced so if you listen with a video iPod or with iTunes, you will see the podcast logo as well as images of the artists and their concerts. Additionally, the Podcasts are broken up into chapters for easy skipping between interviews and songs.
Come ride the waves with us...
channel.itunes:keywords: J-Rock, Japanese, Hip-Hop, Punk Rock, Rock'N'Roll

item.title: OCB Special Announcement #1
item.description: Special Announcenment about our new feed, our next show and new site...
item.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
item.itunes:subtitle: OCB SA #1

item.title: Episode 04 - *fna*
item.description:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: *fna* !!!

A multinational conglomeration in four parts. Alternative/Punk/Indie/rockers from Osaka, Japan.

Pete on vocals and guitar, Yuki on guitar, Cab on bass and the tattooed and lovely Akinko on drums.

Belly on up for the baptism folks, cause *fna* does NOT care!!!
item.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
item.itunes:subtitle: *fna*: We don't care!
item.itunes:summary:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: *fna* !!!
A multinational conglomeration in four parts. Alternative/Punk/Indie/rockers from Osaka, Japan.
Pete on vocals and guitar, Yuki on guitar, Cab on bass and the tattooed and lovely Akinko on drums.
Belly on up for the baptism folks, cause *fna* does NOT care!!!

item.title: Episode 03 - The China Wife Motors
item.description:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS:The China Wife Motors

Osaka Style Motor Rock'N'Roll. Music lovers that like MUSCLE in their MUSIC will really, really, REALLY NOT want to miss this band!!!! These guys will KNOCK your ass OUT!!!Music, pictures and interviews. More in the gallery section of Oceanboom.com.
item.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Osaka Rock'N'Roll - with EXTRA Muscle for added bruises
item.itunes:summary: Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: The China Wife Motors Osaka Style Motor Rock'N'Roll. Music lovers that like MUSCLE in their MUSIC will really, really, REALLY NOT want to miss this band!!!! These guys will KNOCK your ass OUT!!! Music, pictures and interviews.

item.title: Episode 02 - The Radicals
item.description:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: ラディカルズ (The Radicals)

THE QUEENS OF OSAKA!!! An all girl punk band from Osaka, Japan. Music from their first album plus interviews of current and past members.
item.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Radicals: The Queens of Osaka!!!
item.itunes:summary:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: ラディカルズ (The Radicals)
THE QUEENS OF OSAKA!!! An all girl punk band from Osaka, Japan. Music from their first album plus interviews of current and past members.

item.title: Episode 01 - Jump'N'Fall
item.description:
Oceanboom.com PRESENTS: Jump'N'Fall

A three piece Japanese Punk band from Wakayama, this band was originally founded in California in 2001.

Music, interviews and artwork (enhanced podcast). Find more information on Jump'N'Fall in the articles section of Oceanboom.com.
item.itunes:author: Oceanboom.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jump'N'Fall: The Baddest Punx in the West (of Japan)
item.itunes:summary: A three piece Japanese Punk band from Wakayama, this band was originally founded in California in 2001.Music, interviews and artwork (enhanced podcast).Find more information on Jump'N'Fall in the articles section of Oceanboom.com.
